scripts.release: standard-version --releaseCommitMessageFormat="chore: release v{{currentTag}}" && pnpm build && git add . && git commit -m "chore: build released"
scripts.prerelease: standard-version --releaseCommitMessageFormat="chore: release v{{currentTag}}" --prerelease && pnpm build && git add . && git commit -m "chore: build released"
scripts.setup: cd .\server && pnpm install -P && pnpm run setup
scripts.dev-init: pnpm install && concurrently -p [{name}] -n "server,client" -c "green.bold,blue.bold" "cd .\server && pnpm i" "cd .\client && pnpm i" && cd .\server && pnpm run build && pnpm run setup
